2)
```{r}
N <- 1000
minimums <- c()
mins <- rep(0, N)
for (i in 1:N){
  mins[i] <- min(rexp(n=1))
}
minimums[[1]] <- mins
```

3)
```{r}
firstProb <- sum(mins < 0.5) / N
```

4)
```{r}
results <- c()
results[[1]] <- firstProb

for (j in 2:50){
    for (i in 1:N) {
        mins[i]<-min(rexp(n=j))
    }
    results[[j]] <- sum(mins < 0.5) / N
    minimums[[j]] <- mins
}
```

5)
```{r}
plot(x = 1:50, y = results)
```

7)

}
